items.title: Awesome Ava Updates on Jan 16 - Jan 22, 2017
items.summary: 5 awesome projects updated on Jan 16 - Jan 22, 2017
items.content_text:
### Works with AVA

*   [Leakage (⭐1.6k)](https://github.com/andywer/leakage#usage-with-ava--tape) - Memory leak testing.
*   [pify (⭐1.5k)](https://github.com/sindresorhus/pify) - Promisify callback-style functions for better testing. [(Example) (⭐55)](https://github.com/sindresorhus/registry-url/blob/eb1f0e01722208366c9199b96235fd043ec162ae/test.js#L6)
*   [execa (⭐7.2k)](https://github.com/sindresorhus/execa) - Test your CLI tools. [(Example) (⭐67)](https://github.com/sindresorhus/active-win-cli/blob/d01813762b304102d1fee147855481e9f38c8517/test.js#L5-L6)
*   [delay (⭐619)](https://github.com/sindresorhus/delay) - Add delays to your tests. [(Example) (⭐3.8k)](https://github.com/sindresorhus/p-queue/blob/a3a5cadefc2b54269f4939bb34e8dc180c3bd800/test.js#L39)
*   [get-stream (⭐349)](https://github.com/sindresorhus/get-stream) - Test the output of streams. [(Example) (⭐9.4k)](https://github.com/sindresorhus/ora/blob/4ceeedd51795bb88a8033229d198e70cd8a2aff7/test.js#L33-L35)
items.content_html:
Works with AVA

  • Leakage (⭐1.6k) - Memory leak testing.
  • pify (⭐1.5k) - Promisify callback-style functions for better testing. (Example) (⭐55)
  • execa (⭐7.2k) - Test your CLI tools. (Example) (⭐67)
  • delay (⭐619) - Add delays to your tests. (Example) (⭐3.8k)
  • get-stream (⭐349) - Test the output of streams. (Example) (⭐9.4k)

items.title: Awesome Ava Updates on May 02 - May 08, 2016
items.summary: 7 awesome projects updated on May 02 - May 08, 2016
items.content_text:

### Packages

*   [ava-codemods (⭐68)](https://github.com/jamestalmage/ava-codemods) - Codemods that simplifies upgrading to newer versions.
*   [vscode-ava (⭐70)](https://github.com/samverschueren/vscode-ava) - Snippets for Visual Studio Code.
*   [vim-ava-snippets (⭐20)](https://github.com/ahmedelgabri/vim-ava-snippets) - Snippets for Vim.
*   [fly-ava (⭐13)](https://github.com/pine/fly-ava) - Run tests with Fly.
*   [start-ava (⭐6)](https://github.com/start-runner/ava) - Run tests with Start.
*   [sigh-ava (⭐0)](https://github.com/unlight/sigh-ava) - Run tests with Sigh.
